interface.name: logrotate_domtrans
interface.summary: Execute logrotate in the logrotate domain.

param.name: domain
param.summary: The type of the process performing this action.

interface.name: logrotate_run
interface.summary: Execute logrotate in the logrotate domain, and allow the specified role the logrotate domain.

param.name: domain
param.summary: The type of the process performing this action.

param.name: role
param.summary: The role to be allowed the logrotate domain.

param.name: terminal
param.summary: The type of the terminal allow the logrotate domain to use.

interface.name: logrotate_exec
interface.summary: Execute logrotate in the caller domain.

param.name: domain
param.summary: The type of the process performing this action.

interface.name: logrotate_use_fds
interface.summary: Inherit and use logrotate file descriptors.

interface.name: logrotate_dontaudit_use_fds
interface.summary: Do not audit attempts to inherit logrotate file descriptors.

param.name: domain
param.summary: The type of the process to not audit.

param.name: domain
param.summary: The type of the process to not audit.
